description: This file is a C header file that declares exported API functions for an HTTP HFP Module Container in a BroadWay system. It contains function prototypes for creating, removing, enrolling objects, and initializing the container, serving as the interface specification for external modules interacting with the HTTP HFP Container Object.

methods.name: HttpCreateHfpModuleContainer
methods.description: Creates and returns a handle to the HTTP HFP Module Container object using given context handles.

methods.name: HttpHfpMcoCreate
methods.description: Creates an instance of the HTTP HFP Module Container object with specified contexts.

methods.name: HttpHfpMcoRemove
methods.description: Removes and cleans up the HTTP HFP Module Container object identified by the handle.

methods.name: HttpHfpMcoEnrollObjects
methods.description: Enrolls relevant subordinate objects into the HTTP HFP Module Container.

methods.name: HttpHfpMcoInitialize
methods.description: Initializes the HTTP HFP Module Container object.
